div.p:
Submitted for favorable consideration to the honorable the Chief Secretary
Requisition detailswritten by Ernst Heyne; remainderbyM.

19/6/65.
On 26 June 1865,the Under Secretary, J. Moore, minuted: 'Will the Director of the Botanic Garden have the goodness to substitute a requisition for Six months in accordance with a wish expressed by the Honble theTreasurer'.M to J. Moore, 27 June 1865 is a response to the minute.The approved requisitions were forwarded to M on 29 June 1865.
